verbose_text: Hereby, we found that ATX inhibition by PF8380 effectively rescued PPI startle responses in this animal model of schizophrenia to wild-type levels and significantly reduced locomotor hyperactivity, which is a schizophrenia resembling positive symptom and was characteristically displayed after ketamine application (Fig XREF_FIG).
evidence: ATX inhibition by PF8380 effectively rescued PPI
